public class Signal
extends edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.impl.DirectedSparseEdge

A directed edge between Components. The default constructors creates a single bit signal with STD_LOGIC type

Version:
September, 2007
Author:
Ricardo Menotti, DC/UFSCar

Design, Port
